description: Notes on image acquisition: The subs were taken at two different observation sites in the Alps in August and September 2020 with a single-shot color CMOS camera. No filter was needed. I had to reject some subs due to bad seeing conditions. The total exposure time of the remaining images adds up to only 2.1 hours. Processing steps: File selection and bias/dark/flat calibration, star alignment and image integration, background flattening, photometric color calibration, noise reduction, deconvolution, non-linearization, star-background separation, local contrast enhancement, color enhancement, star size reduction, re-adding of the stars. Notes on image processing: Some of the brightest stars had extensive halos which required reduction.
imaging_telescopes: Japan Special Optics LS-12D Wright Väisälä Camera
title: LDN 673 in Aquila
